head.supplied: Melbourne ¶ 17/12/73 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you, that I have returned this day from my Departmental journey to the northern sources of the Yarra, and beg also to state, that in accordan...

div.p: C73/16427, unit 746, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to inform you, that I have returned this day from my Departmental journey to the northern sources of the Yarra, and beg also to state, that in accordance with my previous arrangements the articles from my Laboratory Store building have been removed to a friends place in South Yarra for storage, and that the key has been sent to the Secretary of Agriculture.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,
